description: It's official, the former owner of Pixmap wants to ban our religion of peace and love based on historical events that weren't even reported to God. This is disrespectful. The Deutsche Zeitung team encourages you to share your true opinions at: https://discord.com/channels/1363523961740198148/1434163860360790106, pixmap server: discord.gg/pixmap

text: Ukrpb was officially banned from pixmap.
description: It seems to be the end of the civil war in Ukraine.
